 Commutation of quantification and substitution variables.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 23-Mar-2018.)
statement: sb9 $p |- ( A. x [ x / y ] ph <-> A. y [ y / x ] ph ) $.
